title: Ticket #4799: DRMAA readme not where docs say it is
description:
The HTCondor manual (version 8.2, section 6.2.1) says:
  Also within <release>/include is the file lib_condor_drmaa.README, which gives further details on the implementation.

However, the file appears to be <release>/include/README. I'm not sure if the solution is to update the manual to match the file name or to update the file name to match the manual.
remarks:
2015-Jan-12 15:53:10 by smoler:
More wrong with the files described than just the README file. Note that the directories where these items end up differs depending on installation method (such as tarballs or rpm or debs).

The README is in $(INCLUDE)/README

The header file is $(INCLUDE)/drmaa.h

The library is $(LIB)/libcondordrmaa.a
check_ins: 2015-Jan-12 16:14   Check-in [42172]: correctly identify the location of DRMAA-related files #4799 (By Karen Miller )
creator: bcotton
